treatment.reference: Genome Sequence of the Edible Cyanobacterium Arthrospirai sp. PCC 8005 (Janssen, P.J., et al., 2010)
treatment.description: nonheterocystous filamentous cyanobacteria that typically reside in alkaline lakes. have a high protein content, are rich in essential fatty acids, and produce a variety of minerals, vitamins, and nutritional pigments.
